alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 8:41PM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dickinson, southwestern Geary, south central Riley and western Morris Counties through 915 PM CST... At 840 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Woodbine to 4 miles southeast of Ramona to 3 miles east of Marion. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Herington, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, White City, Hope, Woodbine, Wilsey, Parkerville, Latimer and Burdick. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 293 and 305. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
